element.short: When no match in the mappings
element.definition: What to do when there is no match in the mappings in the group.
element.comment: This only applies if the source code is in the system defined for the group.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
If the mode is 'other-map', a code must be provided
If the mode is 'fixed', a code must be provided
